TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RevisionCustomView extends DocumentFormat.OpenXml.OpenXmlLeafElement

Docs.summary: Revision Custom View. When the object is serialized out as xml, its qualified name is x:rcv.

remarks.format:
## Remarks [!INCLUDE[openxmlnoticeiso](../Token/openxmlnoticeiso_md.md)] **rcv (Revision Custom View)** This element represents a revision record of adding or removing a custom view to the workbook |Parent Elements| |---------------------| |revisions (§18.11.1.16)| |Attributes|Description| |----------------|-----------------| |action (User Action)|An enumeration representing the action that the user performed.

The possible values for this attribute are defined by the *ST_RevisionAction* simple type (§18.18.65).| |guid (GUID)|A globally unique identifier of the custom view.

The possible values for this attribute are defined by the *ST_Guid* simple type (§22.9.2.4).| [*Note*: The W3C XML Schema definition of this element’s content model (CT_RevisionCustomView) is located in §A.2. *end note*] [!INCLUDE[openxmlcopyrightiso](../Token/openxmlcopyrightiso_md.md)]

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the RevisionCustomView class.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property Action As EnumValue(Of RevisionActionValues)

Docs.summary: User Action.Represents the following attribute in the schema: action

remarks.format:
## Remarks The following information from the ECMA International [Standard ECMA-376](http://www.ecma-international.org/publications/standards/Ecma-376.htm) can be useful when working with this class.
An enumeration representing the type of action that the user performed.
The possible values for this attribute are defined by the `ST_RevisionAction` simple type.
